Package com.example.flexiMed.service

Class AmbulanceService

java.lang.Object
com.example.flexiMed.service.AmbulanceService
@Service public class AmbulanceService extends Object
Service class for handling ambulance-related operations. This class provides functionalities such as creating, updating, deleting, retrieving ambulances, finding the closest available ambulance, and dispatching ambulances.

  • Constructor Details

    • AmbulanceService

      public AmbulanceService(AmbulanceRepository ambulanceRepository, RequestRepository requestRepository)
      Constructs an AmbulanceService with the specified repositories.
      Parameters:
      ambulanceRepository - The repository for accessing ambulance records.
      requestRepository - The repository for accessing request records.

  • Method Details

    • saveAmbulance

      public AmbulanceDTO saveAmbulance(AmbulanceDTO ambulance)
      Saves a new ambulance record to the database.
      Parameters:
      ambulance - The AmbulanceDTO containing ambulance data to be saved.
      Returns:
      The saved AmbulanceDTO.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If a concurrent update occurs due to optimistic locking.

    • getAllAmbulances

      public List<AmbulanceDTO> getAllAmbulances()
      Retrieves all ambulances from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of AmbulanceDTO objects representing all ambulances.

    • getAmbulanceById

      public AmbulanceDTO getAmbulanceById(UUID id)
      Retrieves an ambulance by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the ambulance.
      Returns:
      The AmbulanceDTO containing the details of the ambulance.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the ambulance is not found.

    • updateAmbulance

      public AmbulanceDTO updateAmbulance(UUID id, boolean availabilityStatus, String driverName, String driverContact, UUID driverId)
      Updates an ambulance's availability, driver name, driver contact, and driver ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the ambulance.
      availabilityStatus - The updated availability status.
      driverName - The updated driver name.
      driverContact - The updated driver contact information.
      driverId - The updated driver ID.
      Returns:
      The updated AmbulanceDTO.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If the ambulance is not found.

    • deleteAmbulance

      public void deleteAmbulance(UUID id)
      Deletes an ambulance with the specified ID, but only if there are no incomplete requests associated with that ambulance.

    • updateLocation

      public AmbulanceDTO updateLocation(UUID id, double latitude, double longitude)

    • findAmbulanceLocationById

      public Optional<AmbulanceDTO> findAmbulanceLocationById(UUID ambulanceId)
      Retrieves the location (latitude and longitude) of an ambulance by its ID.
      Parameters:
      ambulanceId - The unique identifier of the ambulance.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing an AmbulanceDTO with only the latitude and longitude, or an empty Optional if the ambulance is not found.

    • findAmbulanceByDriverId

      public AmbulanceDTO findAmbulanceByDriverId(UUID driverId)
      Finds an ambulance assigned to a specific driver.
      Parameters:
      driverId - The ID of the driver.
      Returns:
      The AmbulanceDTO containing the details of the assigned ambulance, or an exception if not found.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If no ambulance is found for the given driverId.

    • findClosestAmbulance

      public AmbulanceDTO findClosestAmbulance(double userLatitude, double userLongitude)
      Finds the closest available ambulance to a given user's location.
      Parameters:
      userLatitude - The latitude of the user.
      userLongitude - The longitude of the user.
      Returns:
      The closest available AmbulanceDTO.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If no available ambulances are found or a suitable ambulance cannot be found.

    • dispatchAmbulance

      public RequestDTO dispatchAmbulance(RequestEntity request)
      Dispatches an ambulance to handle a request. Updates the request status and the ambulance availability. Calculates and sets the estimated time of arrival (ETA) based on geographic location.
      Parameters:
      request - The RequestEntity containing request details.
      Returns:
      The updated RequestDTO with arrival time.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the closest ambulance is not found.
